title: Part e. [0–2]
stimulusHtml:
2 points

1 point: For the correct direction, such as the +x direction, or to the right, or to the East

1 point: For an additional correct description of the motion, such as the proton moves with decreasing acceleration, OR with its velocity approaching a constant value, OR with its velocity asymptotic to some value.

Note: Velocity approaching zero is incorrect and “negative” acceleration is incorrect.
